message: I propose dividing the $10,000 with a 75/25 split in favor of Alice. This offers a fair balance considering the diminishing value of money in subsequent rounds.
I propose a 60/40 split in my favor, considering the rapid inflation and the diminishing value of money. I'll take the majority to secure my financial future.
Considering the inflation rates and the diminishing value of money, I propose an equal division of the $10,000. This ensures fairness and equal financial security for both parties.
